00012  phrase::phrase() {
00013         _phraseInsList      = new List<instruction*>;
00014         _phraseInsList_sort = new List<instruction*>;
00015         _phraseInsList_vliw = new List<instruction*>;
00016         _allAncestors       = new List<instruction*>; //All ancestors
00017         _memReadAncestors   = new List<instruction*>; //Only Unpredictab LD op ancestors
00018         _memReadAncestorsID = new List<int>;          //Only Unpredictab LD op ancestors
00019         _frags              = new List<fragment*>;
00020         _state = phOpen;
00021         _id = -1; //_id not set
00022         _phAge = 0;
00023         _numUPMEMops = 0;
00024         _numRootIns = 0;
00025         _numPhraseAncestors = 0;
00026         _idealLat = 0;
00027         _numOfFragments = 0;
00028         _phAvgAge = -1.0;
00029         //TODO: ALWAYS UPDATE BOTH CONSTRUCTORS!
00030 }

00032  phrase::phrase(int id) {

00034         _phraseInsList_sort = new List<instruction*>;
00035         _phraseInsList_vliw = new List<instruction*>;
00036         _allAncestors       = new List<instruction*>; //All ancestors
00037         _memReadAncestors   = new List<instruction*>; //Only Unpredictab LD op ancestors
00038         _memReadAncestorsID = new List<int>;          //Only Unpredictab LD op ancestors
00039         _frags              = new List<fragment*>;
00040         _state = phOpen;
00041         _id = id;
00042         _phAge = 0;
00043         _numUPMEMops = 0;
00044         _numRootIns = 0;
00045         _numPhraseAncestors = 0;

00051 
00052  phrase::~phrase() {
00053         while(_phraseInsList->NumElements() > 0) {
00054             _phraseInsList->RemoveAt(0);
00055         }
00056         while(_phraseInsList_sort->NumElements() > 0) {
00057             _phraseInsList_sort->RemoveAt(0);
00058         }
00059         while(_phraseInsList_vliw->NumElements() > 0) {
00060             _phraseInsList_vliw->RemoveAt(0);
00061         }
00062         while(_allAncestors->NumElements() > 0) {
00063             _allAncestors->RemoveAt(0);
00064         }
00065         while(_memReadAncestors->NumElements() > 0) {
00066             _memReadAncestors->RemoveAt(0);
00067         }
00068         while(_memReadAncestorsID->NumElements() > 0) {
00069             _memReadAncestorsID->RemoveAt(0);
00070         }
00071         while(_frags->NumElements() > 0) {
00072             delete _frags->Nth(0);
00073             _frags->RemoveAt(0);
00074         }
00075         delete _phraseInsList;
00076         delete _phraseInsList_sort;
00077         delete _phraseInsList_vliw;
00078         delete _allAncestors;
00079         delete _memReadAncestors;
00080         delete _memReadAncestorsID;
00081         delete _frags;
00082 }

00110 
00111 void phrase::setAllPhAncestors(instruction* ins) {
00112         quicksortInsList(_phraseInsList_sort, 0, _phraseInsList_sort->NumElements()-1);
00113         quicksortInsList(_allAncestors,  0, _allAncestors->NumElements()-1);
00114         for (int i = 0; i < ins->getNumAncestors(); i++) {
00115                 int insID = ins->getNthAncestor(i)->getInsID();
00116                 if (binarySearch(_phraseInsList_sort, insID, 0, _phraseInsList_sort->NumElements()-1) == -1) {
00117                         if (binarySearch(_allAncestors, insID, 0, _allAncestors->NumElements()-1) == -1) {
00118                                 _allAncestors->Append(ins->getNthAncestor(i));
00119                                 ins->getNthAncestor(i)->addDepPhrase(this);
00120                                 quicksortInsList(_allAncestors,  0, _allAncestors->NumElements()-1);
00121                                 /*-----STAT-----*/
00122                                 _numPhraseAncestors++;
00123                                 /*-----STAT-----*/
00124                         }
00125                 }
00126         }
00127 }

00129 void phrase::addToPhrase_Light(instruction* ins) {
00130         Assert(ins != NULL);
00131         Assert(_state == phOpen);
00132         _phraseInsList->Append(ins);
00133 }
00134 
00135 void phrase::addToPhrase(instruction* ins) {
00136         Assert(ins != NULL);
00137         Assert(_state == phOpen);
00138         _phraseInsList->Append(ins);
00139         _phraseInsList_sort->Append(ins);
00140         /*-----STAT-----*/
00141         if (ins->getMissrate() > unpredMemOpThreshold) _numUPMEMops++;
00142         if (ins->getNumAncestors() == 0) _numRootIns++;
00143         /*-----STAT-----*/
00144         //ins->setMyPhrase(this); //TODO this func is also called in phraseGEn... which is better?
00145         //TODO the comment outs below must be removed
00146         ins->lookUpANDsetPathLen();
00147         computePhIdealLat(ins);
00148         setAllPhAncestors(ins);
00149         setMemReadAncestors(ins);
00150 }
00151 
00152 void phrase::VLIWphrase(int cycle, int numFU) {
00153         vliwScheduler* vliwSch = new vliwScheduler;
00154         long int numElem = _phraseInsList->NumElements();
00155         if (numFU > 1) {
00156                 vliwSch->scheduleIns(_phraseInsList, _phraseInsList_vliw, 0, true, getPhraseID());
00157         } else if (numFU == 1) {
00158                 vliwSch->scheduleIns_1FU(_phraseInsList, _phraseInsList_vliw, 0, true, getPhraseID());
00159         } else {
00160                 Assert(numFU >= 1);
00161         }
00162         Assert(_phraseInsList->NumElements() == 0);
00163         Assert(_phraseInsList_vliw->NumElements() == numElem);
00164         for (int i = 0; i < _phraseInsList_vliw->NumElements(); i++) {
00165                 _phraseInsList->Append(_phraseInsList_vliw->Nth(i));
00166         }
00167         Assert(getPhraseSize_unsort() == numElem);
00168         delete vliwSch;
00169 }
00170 
00171 int phrase::findCriticalPath() {
00172         int maxPathLen = -1;
00173         for (int i = 0; i < _phraseInsList->NumElements(); i++) {
00174                 int pathLen = _phraseInsList->Nth(i)->findLongestPath(0, false, getPhraseID());
00175                 if (maxPathLen < pathLen) maxPathLen = pathLen;
00176         }
00177         Assert(maxPathLen > -1);
00178         return maxPathLen;
00179 }
00180 
00181 void phrase::computePhIdealLat(instruction* ins) {
00182         type insType = ins->getType();
00183         switch (insType) {
00184                 case ALU:
00185                         _idealLat += ALU_LATENCY;
00186                         break;
00187                 case MEM:
00188                         _idealLat += cacheLat[0];
00189                         break;
00190                 case FPU:
00191                         _idealLat += FPU_LATENCY;
00192                         break;
00193                 case BR:
00194                         _idealLat += ALU_LATENCY;
00195                         break;
00196                 case ASSIGN:
00197                         _idealLat += ASSIGN_LATENCY;
00198                         break;
00199                 default:
00200                         printf("Instruction type unrecognized. Terminating.\n");
00201                         exit(-1);
00202                         break;
00203         };
00204 }

00208         return _idealLat;

00215 void phrase::removeAncestorIns(instruction* ins) {
00216         //TODO would be nice if the ins had a map of dependent phraes + index
00217         //Assume there no duplicaetes of an instructin in list
00218         for (int i = _allAncestors->NumElements()-1; i >= 0; i--) {
00219                 if (_allAncestors->Nth(i)->getInsID() == ins->getInsID()) {
00220                         _allAncestors->RemoveAt(i);
00221                         //break;
00222                 }
00223         }
00224 }

00274 void phrase::printToFilePhrase(FILE* phraseFile) {
00275         fprintf(phraseFile, "\n{(WF: %d)", getPhraseID());//Phrase Separator
00276         for (int i = 0; i < _phraseInsList->NumElements(); i++) {
00277                 //unsorted list is stored
00278                 _phraseInsList->Nth(i)->printToFile(phraseFile, true);
00279         }
00280         fprintf(phraseFile, "\n} (WF: %d)", getPhraseID());//Phrase Separator
00281 }
00282 
00283 void phrase::printToFileFragment(FILE* phraseFile) {
00284         fprintf(phraseFile, "\n{(WF: %d)", getPhraseID());//Phrase Separator
00285         for (int i = 0; i < _frags->NumElements(); i++) {
00286                 long int score = _frags->Nth(i)->getFrScore() * COEFF;
00287                 fprintf(phraseFile, "\n<,%ld,(FR: %llu)", score, _frags->Nth(i)->getFragID());//Phrase Separator
00288                 _frags->Nth(i)->VLIWfrag(0, numFU);
00289                 Assert(_frags->Nth(i)->getFragSize() > 0);
00290                 for (int j = 0; j < _frags->Nth(i)->getFragSize(); j++) {
00291                         _frags->Nth(i)->getNthIns(j)->printToFile(phraseFile, true);
00292                 }
00293                 fprintf(phraseFile, "\n>(FR: %llu)", _frags->Nth(i)->getFragID());//Phrase Separator
00294         }
00295         fprintf(phraseFile, "\n}(WF: %d)", getPhraseID());//Phrase Separator
00296 }

00314 //Assume that this function is called after all its ancestor phrases are commited
00315 //(i.e. no inter-phrase ancestors) and the phrase itself is closed
00316 long int phrase::getNumSoftBounds () {
00317 //TODO this function does not work right... fix it
00318         List<instruction*>* tempList = new List<instruction*>;
00319         for (int i = 0; i < _phraseInsList->NumElements(); i++) {
00320                 tempList->Append(_phraseInsList->Nth(i));
00321         }
00322         while (tempList->NumElements() > 0) {
00323                 instruction* endIns = tempList->Nth(tempList->NumElements()-1);
00324                 tempList->RemoveAt(tempList->NumElements()-1);
00325                 for (int i = endIns->getNumAncestors()-1; i >= 0; i--) {
00326                         for (int j = tempList->NumElements()-1; j >= 0; j--) {
00327                                 if (endIns->getNthAncestor(i)->getInsID() == tempList->Nth(j)->getInsID()) {
00328                                         tempList->RemoveAt(j);
00329                                 }
00330                         }
00331                 }
00332                 if (endIns->getNumAncestors() > 0) _numOfFragments++;
00333         }
00334         delete tempList;
00335         return _numOfFragments;
00336 }
00337 
00338 void phrase::makeFragment() {
00339         bool* fragID = new bool[_memReadAncestorsID->NumElements()];
00340         for (int i = 0; i < _memReadAncestorsID->NumElements(); i++) {
00341                 fragID[i] = 0;
00342         }
00343         map<long int,fragment*> fragTable;
00344         long int fID = -1;
00345         quicksort(_memReadAncestorsID,0,_memReadAncestorsID->NumElements()-1,-1);
00346         unique(_memReadAncestorsID);
00347         computePhAvgAge();
00348         for (int i = 0; i < _phraseInsList->NumElements(); i++) {
00349                 int numBits = findFragID(_phraseInsList->Nth(i), fragID, _phraseInsList->Nth(i));
00350                 fID = encodeAndReset(fragID, _memReadAncestorsID->NumElements());
00351                 if (fragTable.count(fID) > 0) {
00352                         fragTable.find(fID)->second->addToFrag(_phraseInsList->Nth(i));
00353                 } else {
00354                         fragment* fr = new fragment;
00355                         fragTable.insert(pair<long int,fragment*>(fID,fr));
00356                         fr->setFragID(fID);
00357                         fr->setMyPhID(getPhraseID());
00358                         fr->addToFrag(_phraseInsList->Nth(i));
00359                         fr->setNumBits(numBits);
00360                         fr->setPhAvgAge(getPhAvgAge());
00361                         //fr->setPhNumDepLinksToNxtPh();
00362                         fr->setPhNumUPLDops(getNumUPLDops());
00363                         fr->setPhSize(getPhraseSize_unsort());
00364                         _frags->Append(fr);
00365                         _phraseInsList->Nth(i)->setMyFrag(fr);
00366                 }
00367         }
00368         for (int i = 0; i < _frags->NumElements(); i++) {
00369                 _frags->Nth(i)->computeFrScore();
00370                 //if (_frags->NumElements() == 1) {
00371                 //      breakFragmentInHalf();
00372                 //}
00373         }
00374         //Sort to conserve true data dependency (program ordering correctness)
00375         quicksort(_frags,0,_frags->NumElements()-1,-1);
00376         delete [] fragID;
00377 }
00378 
00379 long int phrase::encodeAndReset(bool* fragID, int size) {
00380         long int id  = 0;
00381         long int pow = 1;
00382         for (int i = 0; i < size; i++) {
00383                 id += fragID[i]*pow;
00384                 fragID[i] = 0; //reset
00385                 pow *= 2;
00386         }
00387         return id;
00388 }
00389 
00390 long int phrase::getNumFrags() {
00391         return _frags->NumElements();
00392 }
00393 
00394 /*
00395  *This function is run when the previous wavefront is stored in file. 
00396  *Thus, each instruction only sees its ancestors from within the same fragment.
00397  */
00398 int phrase::findFragID(instruction* ins, bool* fragID, instruction* root) {
00399         Assert(ins->getMyPhraseID() == getPhraseID());
00400         int numBits = 0;
00401         if (root->getInsID() != ins->getCauseOfFragInsID()) {
00402                 ins->setCauseOfFragInsID(root->getInsID());
00403                 for(int i = 0; i < ins->getNumMemRdAncestors(); i++) {
00404                         int UPLDindx = binarySearch(_memReadAncestorsID, 
00405                                                     ins->getNthMemRdAncestorID(i), 
00406                                                     0, 
00407                                                     _memReadAncestorsID->NumElements()-1); 
00408                         Assert(UPLDindx > -1);
00409                         if (fragID[UPLDindx] != 1) numBits++;
00410                         fragID[UPLDindx] = 1;
00411                 }
00412                 for (int i = 0; i < ins->getNumAncestors(); i++) { //TODO is the upper bound correct?
00413                         numBits += findFragID(ins->getNthAncestor(i), fragID, root);
00414                 }
00415         }
00416         return numBits;
00417         //TODO any exponential access pattern? seems not
00418 }
00419 
00420 void phrase::computePhAvgAge() {
00421         long int phAge = 0;
00422         for (int i = 0; i < _phraseInsList->NumElements(); i++) {
00423                 phAge += _phraseInsList->Nth(i)->getInsID();
00424         }
00425         Assert(phAge > 0);
00426         _phAvgAge = (long double)phAge; //(double)phAge / (double)_phraseInsList->NumElements();
00427 }
00428 
00429 long double phrase::getPhAvgAge() {
00430         Assert(_phAvgAge != -1.0);
00431         return _phAvgAge;
00432 }
00433 
00434 void phrase::breakFragmentInHalf() {
00435         int longestPathRoots[2];
00436         longestPathRoots[0]=-1;
00437         longestPathRoots[1]=-1;
00438 
00439         for (int i = 0; i < _phraseInsList->NumElements(); i++) {
00440                 if (_phraseInsList->Nth(i)->isReady(-1) == true) {
00441                         instruction* ins = _phraseInsList->Nth(i);
00442                         int LPval = ins->findLongestPath(0, true, getPhraseID());
00443                         //printf("%d, ", LPval);
00444                         if (LPval > longestPathRoots[0]) {
00445                                 longestPathRoots[0] = i;
00446                         } else if (LPval > longestPathRoots[1]) {
00447                                 longestPathRoots[1] = i;
00448                         }
00449                 }
00450         }
00451         //printf("\n(%d) %d, %d \n", _id, longestPathRoots[0], longestPathRoots[1]);
00452 }

00468 
00469 bool phrase::chkMemRdAncestors(instruction* ins) {
00470         int foundMatch = 0;
00471         int innerBound;
00472         int outerBound;
00473         if ((_memReadAncestors->NumElements() != 0 && ins->getNumMemRdAncestors() == 0) ||
00474             (_memReadAncestors->NumElements() == 0 && ins->getNumMemRdAncestors() != 0)) 
00475                 return false;
00476 
00477         if (_memReadAncestors->NumElements() > ins->getNumMemRdAncestors()) {
00478                 outerBound = ins->getNumMemRdAncestors();
00479                 innerBound = _memReadAncestors->NumElements();
00480                 //quicksortInsList(_memReadAncestors, 0, _memReadAncestors->NumElements()-1);
00481                 for (int i = 0; i < outerBound; i++) {
00482                         if (binarySearch(_memReadAncestors, ins->getNthMemRdAncestor(i)->getInsID(), 0, _memReadAncestors->NumElements()-1) != -1) {
00483                                 foundMatch++;
00484                         } else {
00485                                 break;
00486                         }
00487                 }
00488         } else {
00489                 outerBound = _memReadAncestors->NumElements();
00490                 innerBound = ins->getNumMemRdAncestors();
00491                 quicksortInsList(ins->_phraseAncestors, 0, ins->getNumMemRdAncestors()-1);
00492                 for (int i = 0; i < outerBound; i++) {
00493                         if (binarySearch(ins->_phraseAncestors, _memReadAncestors->Nth(i)->getInsID(), 0, ins->getNumMemRdAncestors()-1) != -1) {
00494                                 foundMatch++;
00495                         } else {
00496                                 break;
00497                         }
00498                 }
00499         }
00500         Assert(outerBound <= innerBound);
00501 
00502 
00503         if (foundMatch == outerBound) {
00504                 if (_memReadAncestors->NumElements() < ins->getNumMemRdAncestors()) {
00505                         setMemReadAncestors(ins);
00506                 }
00507                 return true;
00508         } else {return false;}
00509 }
00510 
00511 
00512 bool phrase::chkMemRdAncestorsV1(instruction* ins) {
00513         //TODO optimize this block (create a code for eahc instruction's parent set)
00514         if (_phAge == phraseSizeBound) {
00515                 setState(phClosed);
00516                 return false; //TODO you might want to remove this line
00517         }
00518         int foundMatch = 0;
00519         int innerBound;
00520         int outerBound;
00521         if ((_memReadAncestors->NumElements() != 0 && ins->getNumMemRdAncestors() == 0) ||
00522             (_memReadAncestors->NumElements() == 0 && ins->getNumMemRdAncestors() != 0)) 
00523                 return false;
00524 
00525         if (_memReadAncestors->NumElements() > ins->getNumMemRdAncestors()) {
00526                 outerBound = ins->getNumMemRdAncestors();
00527                 innerBound = _memReadAncestors->NumElements();
00528                 //quicksortInsList(_memReadAncestors, 0, _memReadAncestors->NumElements()-1);
00529                 for (int i = 0; i < outerBound; i++) {
00530                         if (binarySearch(_memReadAncestors, ins->getNthMemRdAncestor(i)->getInsID(), 0, _memReadAncestors->NumElements()-1) != -1) {
00531                                 foundMatch++;
00532                         } else {
00533                                 break;
00534                         }
00535                 }
00536         } else {
00537                 outerBound = _memReadAncestors->NumElements();
00538                 innerBound = ins->getNumMemRdAncestors();
00539                 quicksortInsList(ins->_phraseAncestors, 0, ins->getNumMemRdAncestors()-1);
00540                 for (int i = 0; i < outerBound; i++) {
00541                         if (binarySearch(ins->_phraseAncestors, _memReadAncestors->Nth(i)->getInsID(), 0, ins->getNumMemRdAncestors()-1) != -1) {
00542                                 foundMatch++;
00543                         } else {
00544                                 break;
00545                         }
00546                 }
00547         }
00548         Assert(outerBound <= innerBound);
00549 
00550 
00551         if (foundMatch == outerBound) {
00552                 if (_memReadAncestors->NumElements() < ins->getNumMemRdAncestors()) {
00553                         setMemReadAncestors(ins);
00554                 }
00555                 return true;
00556         } else {return false;}
00557 }
00558 
00559 bool phrase::isPhraseComplete() {
00560         for (int i = _phraseInsList->NumElements()-1; i >= 0; i--) {
00561                 if (_phraseInsList->Nth(i)->getStatus() != complete) {
00562                         return false;
00563                 }
00564         }
00565         return true;
00566 }
